name: part_010
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】First Starring Role【轟はじめ⧸ReGLOSS】 #轟はじめ生誕祭2025 [bjPYXtxhm0I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Peter Pan', including a tap dance segment.
MC segment where Todoroki Hajime talks about her performance and introduces upcoming songs.
Performance of the original song 'Countach' with backup dancers.

subtitles.original: わーおー
subtitles.english: Woah-oh

subtitles.original: こっち指差して笑ってんだろ
subtitles.english: You're pointing this way and laughing, aren't you?

subtitles.original: 好きに笑えよ それで別にいいさ
subtitles.english: Laugh all you want, it's fine by me.

subtitles.original: お前なんかにも お前らなんかに
subtitles.english: To people like you... Yeah, to people like you,

subtitles.original: 何も言われたくない 黙って見てろ
subtitles.english: I don't want to hear anything. Just shut up and watch.

subtitles.original: やり直しのきかない人生 一度でいいチャンスをください
subtitles.english: A life that can't be redone, please give me just one good chance.

subtitles.original: 掴んで離さない もう俺のものなんだ
subtitles.english: I'll grab it and never let go, it's mine now.

subtitles.original: ネバーランドの大気圏を 破って今夢を叶えるんだ
subtitles.english: Break through the atmosphere of Neverland and make your dream come true now.

subtitles.original: 笑う奴など 蹴り飛ばせ
subtitles.english: Kick away those who laugh at you.

subtitles.original: 打つ手はない残されてない ネガティブを押し付けてくんな
subtitles.english: No moves left? Don't force your negativity on me.

subtitles.original: 大人のあんたも知らない世界を 俺は生きてるんだ
subtitles.english: I'm living in a world even you adults don't know.

subtitles.original: ピーターパン症候群と 思われたって馬鹿にされたって
subtitles.english: Even if I'm thought to have Peter Pan Syndrome, even if I'm made fun of...

subtitles.original: おとぎ話みたいなハッピーエンドに 一直線に進んでいくんだ
subtitles.english: I'll head straight for a happy ending like in a fairy tale.

subtitles.original: 夢の見過ぎと馬鹿にされた少年が
subtitles.english: The story of a boy who was ridiculed

subtitles.original: 夢を掴む物語を
subtitles.english: for dreaming too much, seizing his dream.

subtitles.original: 見事な逆転劇をこの手で 巻き起こせ 見せつけろ
subtitles.english: Bring about a brilliant comeback with these hands! Show them!

subtitles.original: にっちもさっちもいかないよ 綺麗事に踊らされ
subtitles.english: I'm stuck in a bind, dancing to sugar-coated words.

subtitles.original: 大人の言う常識なんてものは 丸めて捨てちまえ
subtitles.english: Things like 'common sense' adults talk about? Roll them up and throw them away!

subtitles.original: ピーターパン症候群と 呼びたきゃ叫び散らしてろよ
subtitles.english: If you want to call it Peter Pan Syndrome, then go ahead and scream it out.

subtitles.original: おとぎ話みたいなハッピーエンドを そう自ら掴み取るんだ
subtitles.english: I'll seize a fairy-tale-like happy end with my own hands!

subtitles.original: わーおー
subtitles.english: Woah-oh

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: えー、改め、はじめまして！
subtitles.english: Um, once again, nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: 初めてタップに挑戦しました。声は、入りちょった？
subtitles.english: I tried tap dancing for the first time. Was my voice picked up?

subtitles.original: そして、えー、初めての歌枠で歌った、はじめの大好きな、えー、優里さんの『ピーターパン』でした！ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: And that was Yuuri-san's 'Peter Pan,' which I sang in my very first singing stream and which I love! Thank you!

subtitles.original: 次はオリ曲を2曲やっていきます！
subtitles.english: Next, I'll be doing two original songs!

subtitles.original: えっ、オリ曲2曲？えっ、そんな持ってたっけ、轟はじめ？
subtitles.english: Eh, two original songs? Wait, did Hajime Todoroki have that many?

subtitles.original: 『Countach』そして、新曲が出ます！
subtitles.english: 'Countach' and then... a new song is coming out!

subtitles.original: 2曲続けて聴いてください！
subtitles.english: Please listen to these two songs in a row!

subtitles.original: それでは聴いてください、『Countach』！
subtitles.english: Now, please listen to 'Countach'!

subtitles.original: Countach
subtitles.english: Countach

subtitles.original: 何のため頑張るの 報われない Day by Day
subtitles.english: What am I working hard for? Day by day without reward.

subtitles.original: 結局正直者が 道化師で踊る残像
subtitles.english: In the end, the honest ones are just afterimages of clowns dancing.

subtitles.original: 狡賢く生きてるあの子 懐に舞い込む
subtitles.english: That kid living craftily, slipping into favor...

subtitles.original: 優等生でしょ
subtitles.english: You're a model student, aren't you?

subtitles.original: アブラカタブラ 開けるよパンドラ
subtitles.english: Abracadabra, I'm opening Pandora's box.

subtitles.original: 抑えきれないのさ 歌うかサンドラ
subtitles.english: I can't hold it back, shall I sing, Sandra?

subtitles.original: シェイクスピアも真っ青 暴れ馬で降臨 カーニバル
subtitles.english: Shakespeare would turn pale. Descending like a wild horse, it's a carnival.

subtitles.original: Everybody gonna put your hand clap clap まだ見ぬ世界 飛び込め 3 2 1
subtitles.english: Everybody gonna put your hand clap clap. Dive into the unknown world, 3 2 1!

subtitles.original: 上がれ壇上へ 体揺らして
subtitles.english: Get up on the stage and move your body!

subtitles.original: 既成概念 あるがままぶち壊せ
subtitles.english: Break down those preconceived notions just as they are!

subtitles.original: 上がれ壇上へ 体揺らして
subtitles.english: Get up on the stage and move your body!

subtitles.original: 既成概念 あるがままぶち壊せ
subtitles.english: Break down those preconceived notions just as they are!

subtitles.original: Countach 最上級の Countach
subtitles.english: Countach! The ultimate Countach!

subtitles.original: Countach 一心不乱で Countach
subtitles.english: Countach! With focused concentration, Countach!

subtitles.original: Countach 火蓋を Countach
subtitles.english: Countach! Fire the opening shot, Countach!

subtitles.original: Countach 難度だって Countach
subtitles.english: Countach! Whatever the difficulty, Countach!

subtitles.original: 息を潜めて自分を 殺すのはもう慣れてんの
subtitles.english: I'm used to holding my breath and killing my true self.

subtitles.original: 存在価値 存在証明なんて どうでもええわ
subtitles.english: Worth or proof of existence, I don't care about any of that.

subtitles.original: 宴ならエンドレス 今宵突破らえよボーダーレス
subtitles.english: If it's a banquet, it's endless. Tonight, break through and make it borderless.

subtitles.original: 神の雷浴びちゃって Perfect 弾け飛んで理想郷
subtitles.english: Bathed in the lightning of God, perfect! Bursting into a utopia.

subtitles.original: アブラカタブラ 開けるよパンドラ
subtitles.english: Abracadabra, I'm opening Pandora's box.

subtitles.original: 抑えきれないのさ
subtitles.english: I can't hold it back.
